attributes.action: Remove the restriction on free bus travel as to local council rules apply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This pepetition, would give more freedom, for bus pass holders who visit other areas who may relish in perks applied to them by there local district/metropolitan/borough councils, saw visitors can take privelage

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
